ChatInterface.structure: Mobile-first container, max-w-md mx-auto on desktop, h-[100dvh] flex flex-col bg-[#E5E5EA]
ChatInterface.header: Sticky top, bg-primary text-primary-foreground, contains Avatar + Name + Status
ChatInterface.input_area: Fixed bottom, bg-white p-3 border-t flex items-center gap-2

ChatBubble.bot: bg-white text-gray-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-none shadow-sm self-start max-w-[85%]
ChatBubble.user: bg-primary text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-none shadow-sm self-end max-w-[85%]
ChatBubble.typing_indicator: Three bouncing dots in a bot bubble

QuickReplies.style: Horizontal scroll container (no scrollbar), gap-2 p-2
QuickReplies.item: whitespace-nowrap px-4 py-2 rounded-full bg-white border border-primary/20 text-primary text-sm font-medium hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors shadow-sm active:scale-95

Cards.PolicyQuote: Bento-style grid inside a chat bubble. White bg, rounded-xl, p-4. Sections for 'Plan Name', 'Premium', 'Coverage Highlights'.
Cards.Comparison: Side-by-side columns for 'Third Party' vs 'Comprehensive'. Highlight 'Recommended' tag.

layout_strategies.mobile_first: Always design for 375px width first. Use 'md:' prefix for desktop constraints.
layout_strategies.safe_areas: Ensure padding-bottom-safe for iPhone home indicator.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on primary color is White. Text on light bubbles is Gray-900.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-label if icon-only.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/outfit' and '@fontsource/nunito' to package.json immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined in this JSON. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build the 'ChatLayout' component first. It acts as the shell.
4. BUILD PRIMITIVES: Create 'ChatBubble', 'QuickReply', 'TypingIndicator' components before implementing logic.
5. MOCK DATA: Use the provided image URLs for the 'Jiffy Jane' avatar and 'Income' logo.
6. CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Outfit' for headings and 'Nunito' for body.
7. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Input' area stays above the mobile keyboard (use proper viewport meta tags or layout techniques).
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to every button, input, and message bubble.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic AI aesthetics. Use the specific 'Income Orange' (#F96302) boldly.
Micro-interactions are key. Buttons should scale down slightly on press.
Do not use 100% transparent backgrounds for headers; use backdrop-blur-md with high opacity bg.
